name: Yellowstone National Park
description: One of the premier National Parks in the USA
directions: Take Highway 20 north All the way to West Yellowstone. Turn right at the first light. Then left at the second light to find the West entrance.

name: Craters of The Moon
imgAlt: Image of Craters of the moon
description: Amazing scenery in one of the youngest volcanic areas in Idaho
directions: Take Highway 33 west out of Rexburg. Total drive 2-2.5 hrs

name: Harriman State Park
description: Beautiful park full of forests, meadows, and lakes. Hiking, biking and horsebackriding in the summer...Cross country skiing, snowshoeing and fatbiking in the winter.
directions: Take Highway 20 north to Ashton. Continue on until almost to the Henries Fork. Turn left when you see the signs.
